segments.text: Red cooked carp and rape with fresh mushrooms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which condiment do you use for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll use ginger , garlic scallion , hot pepper and vinegar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good , need I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , don't need , I can do myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I can watch TV now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you must cook that dinner next time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll do it next time .
segments.speaker: S1
